```{python}
colors = ["#FF8C00", "#A020F0", "#008B8B"]

```

```{python}

penguins["bill_ratio"] = (
   penguins["bill_length_mm"] / penguins["bill_depth_mm"] 
)
sns.displot(penguins, 
            x = "bill_ratio", 
            hue = "species", 
            kind = "kde", fill = True, aspect = 2, height = 3)
plt.show()
```

```{python}
def collatz(num):
    if num % 2 == 0:
        return num // 2
    else:
        return 3 * num + 1

number = 5

while number != 1:
    number = collatz(int(number))
    print(number)
```
